rules.title: Be Respectful
rules.description: Treat all members with respect. No harassment, hate speech, discrimination, or bullying of any kind.

rules.title: No Spam
rules.description: Do not spam messages, links, or emojis. Keep conversations meaningful and on-topic.

rules.title: No NSFW Content
rules.description: Do not share adult, explicit, or inappropriate content in channels unless designated for such content.

rules.title: No Advertising
rules.description: Do not advertise other servers, products, or services without explicit permission from moderators.

rules.title: No Exploits or Cheating
rules.description: Do not use exploits, hacks, or cheats. Report bugs to staff instead of exploiting them.

rules.title: Follow Channel Topics
rules.description: Keep messages on-topic for the channel. Use appropriate channels for different discussions.

rules.title: No Impersonation
rules.description: Do not impersonate staff members or other users. Be honest about your identity.

rules.title: Listen to Staff
rules.description: Follow instructions from moderators and administrators. If you disagree with a decision, appeal respectfully.
